original_text: For who is there of all flesh, that has heard the voice of the living God speaking out of the midst of fire as we have, and has still lived?
korean_text: 육신을 가진 자로서 우리처럼 살아 계시는 하나님의 음성이 불 가운데에서 발함을 듣고 생존한 자가 누구니이까

sentences.original_text: For who is there of all flesh,
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 살아있는 자 중에 누가 있겠느냐,

sentences.original_text: that has heard the voice of the living God
sentences.korean_translation: 살아 계신 하나님의 음성을 들은 자가

sentences.original_text: speaking out of the midst of fire
